input_text:
Job Title: Skin Operator (Skin Rumps/Side Skinner Top To Bottom - Harvest I) 1st Shift , Newbern, TN

Location: Newbern, TN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Details:

This position starts at $21.65/hr. with a shift increase for second and third shift and potential for overtime. We have open positions for first shift.

If you are looking to make an impact in a meaningful way, join us at Tyson Foods where we are raising the worldâ€™s expectations for how much good food can do! We create quality products in a safe environment for our team members. We offer great benefits and steady work. This facility operates five days a week and produces Sausage Patties, Sausage Links and Roll Sausage.

Job Description:

Responsible for learning how to maintain sharp tools to perform their job task correctly; making precision cuts to carcass that allows for correct further processing to achieve desired carcass yield; making precision cuts to carcass to remove hide only to achieve desired carcass yield; operating a powered tool to perform job task. Average training time may require 2-3 months. Must also adheres to good safety practices, food safety policies, and company policies. Responsible for setting up area with all needed equipment. Monitor production area for trash and food debris on floor. Perform various other tasks as assigned by Lead person, Supervisor or Superintendent.

Requirements:

PHYSICAL REQUIREMENTS: The successful candidate(s) must be willing and able to perform the physical requirements of the job with or without a reasonable accommodation.

Must be able to lift/carry up to 50 pounds.Must be able to complete work cycles in less than 20 seconds.Must be able to work on and around machinery and chemicals.Must clean up area at end of production shift, including but not limited to sweeping, picking up debris from the floor, and spraying work areas.Must be able to perform the following task for periods of 8 hours on concrete floor, some of which may include but is not limited to standing, stooping, walking, climbing, and lifting.Must be able to work in temperatures less than or equal to 35 degrees Fahrenheit temperature for minimum of 8 hours.Must be able to work in a wet environment.Must be able to complete cycles in less than 10 seconds.

Must have at least 3 months previous work experience with a single employer within the last 18 months. This facility does not accept rehires.

Relocation Assistance Eligible:

No

Work Shift: 

1ST SHIFT (United States of America)

Hourly Applicants ONLY -You must complete the task after submitting your application to provide additional information to be considered for employment.

Tyson is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will be considered without regard to race, national origin, color, religion, age, genetics, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or veteran status.

We provide our team members and their families with paid time off; 401(k) plans; affordable health, life, dental, vision and prescription drug benefits; and more.

CCPA Notice. If you are a California resident, and would like to learn more about what categories of personal information we collect when you apply for this job, and how we may use that information, please read our CCPA Job Applicant Notice at Collection, click here.

Experience Level (if available): None
